title: AP LEONA?
body:
Hey guys,
Does ap Leona work? I think she does good damage if you get a lich or a gaunt, cos its good with her q. Otherwise does she work? Thanks

replies.body:
since she does mostly AOE damage with W E R. lichbane helps your single target burst. but you need to get a lot of AP for that. and getting tanky helps her a lot but doesnt help her damage, but she can do damage for longer...

liandries IBG abyssal zonyas bannerofcommand and another CDR item. basically makes you tanky, and if people stay on you too long, you whittle them down with liandries, and IBG helps that burn with the slow.

just because a champ has AP ratios doesnt mean they are good in that regards. you might see some AP nocturnes/mf's/caits. what happens to them? they always lose. ive seen exactly 5 AP mf's in ARAM and they ALL lost. why use AP for a cait when she has such a long range aa? its just stupid. if you wanna do something different theres plenty more viable stuff left to be done, or....theres 124/5 champs in the game, how about playing any other one of them....
Leona ap is good if you know how to play her and a good build.
I went Ap leo this morning actually vsing a Katarina went 13/11/19, I would say it works but there is a heavy downside as she is not very manoeuvrable and she is quite squishy with no tank on her.
I saw an AP Leona mid absolutely dominate once, probably takes practice. Her passive however is not made for a solo lane. So she's definitely not as useful there imho
she becomes to squishy to go in to fights if its bots then yeah it would work
It's actually really good if played right
Gauntlet though, is always good on Leo :D

Not particularly scaling isnt great and shes built to supportby peeling really hard and dealing tons of damage with her adc (her passive can be so op)

I've seen it in my games but it doesnt do much damage at all
